attributes.action: Parliament:  ignore the Brexit vote and vote stop Art 50 being triggered
attributes.additional_details: There is overwhelming evidence in the media and elsewhere that the result of the referendum is not in the National interest and is as a result of a protest vote against the establishment and the political status quo rather than a genuine desire to leave the EU.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call on Parliament in the National interest not to follow the EU referendum result (as is within its rights) and to vote to prevent the PM triggering the Art 50 (Lisbon Treaty) exit process.
